comments.body: What is the reasoning for lowering the `defaultConcurrency`?

For ensuring only one instance of a given job is run at a time. Covers the recurrent jobs. Without this, when I had multiple instances of RC, the same job was being run everywhere at the same time instead of just in one place

Oh, alright! Thanks for clarifying :) Maybe it's worth adding the comment

```suggestion
                        // this ensures the same job doesn't get executed multiple times in a cluster 
			defaultConcurrency: 1,
```
